dataTemplate.name: XXARCBIPRI_CA
dataTemplate.description: OD: (CA) AR Get Summary Billing Data -CERTEGY

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT tax_id ,tax_id_desc ,return_address_line1 ,return_address_line2 ,return_city ,return_state ,return_postal_code FROM apps.xx_ar_sys_info

SELECT attribute9 billing_id ,attribute12 account_number ,attribute11 account_name ,attribute10 sales_channel ,customer_id ,customer_id info_customer_id ,customer_id sumz_customer_id ,customer_id one_customer_id FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history WHERE 1 =1 AND print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND process_flag !='Y' AND attribute13 =:p_request_id GROUP BY attribute9 ,attribute12 ,attribute11 ,attribute10 ,customer_id

select od_summbills.billing_site_id billing_site_id ,od_summbills.billing_site_id info_billing_site_id ,od_summbills.billing_site_id sumz_billing_site_id ,od_summbills.billing_site_id one_billing_site_id ,substr(hzlo.address1 ,1 ,40) bill_to_address_line1 ,substr(hzlo.address2 ,1 ,40) bill_to_address_line2 ,substr(hzlo.address3 ,1 ,40) bill_to_address_line3 ,substr(hzlo.address4 ,1 ,40) bill_to_address_line4 ,substr(hzlo.city ,1 ,40) bill_to_city ,hzlo.state bill_to_state ,REPLACE(hzlo.postal_code ,'-' ,'') bill_to_postal_code ,hzlo.province bill_to_province ,hzlo.country bill_to_country ,substr(rhzlo.address1 ,1 ,40) remit_to_address_line1 ,substr(rhzlo.address2 ,1 ,40) remit_to_address_line2 ,substr(rhzlo.address3 ,1 ,40) remit_to_address_line3 ,substr(rhzlo.address4 ,1 ,40) remit_to_address_line4 ,substr(rhzlo.city ,1 ,40) remit_to_city ,rhzlo.state remit_to_state ,REPLACE(rhzlo.postal_code ,'-' ,'') remit_to_postal_code ,rhzlo.country remit_to_country ,xx_ar_print_summbill.get_od_contact_info(:sales_channel ,hzlo.country ,'ORDER') order_contact ,xx_ar_print_summbill.get_od_contact_info(:sales_channel ,hzlo.country ,'ACCOUNT') account_contact from hz_cust_acct_sites hzas ,hz_cust_site_uses hzsu ,hz_party_sites hzps ,hz_locations hzlo ,hz_cust_acct_sites rhzca ,hz_party_sites rhzps ,hz_locations rhzlo ,(select customer_id ,to_number(attribute7) billing_site_id from xx_ar_cons_bills_history where 1 =1 and print_date <=trunc(sysdate) and process_flag !='Y' and attribute13 =:p_request_id group by customer_id ,to_number(attribute7) ) od_summbills where hzas.cust_account_id =:customer_id and hzas.cust_account_id =od_summbills.customer_id and od_summbills.billing_site_id =hzsu.site_use_id and hzsu.cust_acct_site_id =hzas.cust_acct_site_id and hzps.party_site_id =hzas.party_site_id and hzlo.location_id =hzps.location_id and rhzca.cust_acct_site_id =xx_ar_print_summbill.get_remitaddressid(od_summbills.billing_site_id) and rhzps.party_site_id =rhzca.party_site_id and rhzlo.location_id =rhzps.location_id

SELECT document_id doc_id ,UPPER(layout) layout ,sort_by sort_by ,attribute2 total_by ,attribute3 page_break ,cons_inv_id cbi_id1 FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history WHERE 1 =1 AND print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND paydoc ='Y' AND process_flag !='Y' AND customer_id =:customer_id AND attribute7 =:billing_site_id AND attribute13 =:p_request_id

SELECT arci.cons_inv_id cons_inv_id ,arci.cons_billing_number billing_number ,arci.currency_code currency ,SUBSTR(terms.description ,1 ,15) terms ,TO_CHAR( NVL( xx_ar_print_summbill.get_bill_from_date(arci.customer_id ,arci.site_use_id ,arci.cons_inv_id ,'PAYDOC' ) ,TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) ,'DD-MON-YY' ) bill_from_date -- ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date)-1 ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.due_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') payment_due ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'EXTAMT_PLUS_DELVY') cbi_extamt_incl_delvy ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'DISCOUNT') cbi_promo_and_disc ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'TAX') cbi_tax ,od_summbills.attribute14 cbi_amount_due ,xx_ar_print_summbill.xx_fin_check_digit(:account_number ,arci.cons_billing_number ,(TO_NUMBER(od_summbills.attribute14) *100)) scanline ,layout pd_layout1 ,layout pd_layout2 ,layout pd_layout3 ,'ORIGINAL CONSOLIDATED BILL' doc_title FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history od_summbills ,ar_cons_inv arci ,ra_terms terms WHERE od_summbills.cons_inv_id =arci.cons_inv_id AND od_summbills.customer_id =:customer_id AND od_summbills.attribute7 =:billing_site_id AND terms.term_id =arci.term_id AND od_summbills.print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND od_summbills.document_id =:doc_id AND od_summbills.paydoc ='Y' AND NVL(od_summbills.process_flag, 'N') !='Y' AND od_summbills.attribute13 =:p_request_id AND od_summbills.cons_inv_id =:cbi_id1 AND od_summbills.layout ='DETAIL'

SELECT arci.cons_inv_id cons_inv_id1 ,arci.cons_billing_number billing_number ,arci.currency_code currency ,SUBSTR(terms.description ,1 ,15) terms ,TO_CHAR( NVL( xx_ar_print_summbill.get_bill_from_date(arci.customer_id ,arci.site_use_id ,arci.cons_inv_id ,'PAYDOC' ) ,TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) ,'DD-MON-YY' ) bill_from_date -- ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date)-1 ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.due_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') payment_due ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'EXTAMT_PLUS_DELVY') cbi_extamt_incl_delvy ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'DISCOUNT') cbi_promo_and_disc ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'TAX') cbi_tax ,od_summbills.attribute14 cbi_amount_due ,xx_ar_print_summbill.xx_fin_check_digit(:account_number ,arci.cons_billing_number ,(TO_NUMBER(od_summbills.attribute14) *100)) scanline ,layout pd_layout1 ,layout pd_layout2 ,layout pd_layout3 ,'ORIGINAL CONSOLIDATED BILL' doc_title FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history od_summbills ,ar_cons_inv arci ,ra_terms terms WHERE od_summbills.cons_inv_id =arci.cons_inv_id AND od_summbills.customer_id =:customer_id AND od_summbills.attribute7 =:billing_site_id AND terms.term_id =arci.term_id AND od_summbills.print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND od_summbills.document_id =:doc_id AND od_summbills.paydoc ='Y' AND NVL(od_summbills.process_flag, 'N') !='Y' AND od_summbills.attribute13 =:p_request_id AND od_summbills.cons_inv_id =:cbi_id1 AND od_summbills.layout ='SUMMARIZE'

SELECT arci.cons_inv_id cons_inv_id2 ,arci.cons_billing_number billing_number ,arci.currency_code currency ,SUBSTR(terms.description ,1 ,15) terms ,TO_CHAR( NVL( xx_ar_print_summbill.get_bill_from_date(arci.customer_id ,arci.site_use_id ,arci.cons_inv_id ,'PAYDOC' ) ,TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) ,'DD-MON-YY' ) bill_from_date -- ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date)-1 ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.due_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') payment_due ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'EXTAMT_PLUS_DELVY') cbi_extamt_incl_delvy ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'DISCOUNT') cbi_promo_and_disc ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'TAX') cbi_tax ,od_summbills.attribute14 cbi_amount_due ,xx_ar_print_summbill.xx_fin_check_digit(:account_number ,arci.cons_billing_number ,(TO_NUMBER(od_summbills.attribute14) *100)) scanline ,layout pd_layout1 ,layout pd_layout2 ,layout pd_layout3 ,'ORIGINAL CONSOLIDATED BILL' doc_title FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history od_summbills ,ar_cons_inv arci ,ra_terms terms WHERE od_summbills.cons_inv_id =arci.cons_inv_id AND od_summbills.customer_id =:customer_id AND od_summbills.attribute7 =:billing_site_id AND terms.term_id =arci.term_id AND od_summbills.print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND od_summbills.document_id =:doc_id AND od_summbills.paydoc ='Y' AND NVL(od_summbills.process_flag, 'N') !='Y' AND od_summbills.attribute13 =:p_request_id AND od_summbills.cons_inv_id =:cbi_id1 AND od_summbills.layout ='ONE'

SELECT REPLACE(sfhdr1 ,':' ,'') sfhdr1 ,REPLACE(sfhdr2 ,':' ,'') sfhdr2 ,REPLACE(sfhdr3 ,':' ,'') sfhdr3 ,REPLACE(sfhdr4 ,':' ,'') sfhdr4 ,REPLACE(sfhdr5 ,':' ,'') sfhdr5 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id1 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') GROUP BY sfhdr1 ,sfhdr2 ,sfhdr3 ,sfhdr4 ,sfhdr5

SELECT REPLACE(sfhdr1 ,':' ,'') infosumz_sfhdr1 ,REPLACE(sfhdr2 ,':' ,'') infosumz_sfhdr2 ,REPLACE(sfhdr3 ,':' ,'') infosumz_sfhdr3 ,REPLACE(sfhdr4 ,':' ,'') infosumz_sfhdr4 ,REPLACE(sfhdr5 ,':' ,'') infosumz_sfhdr5 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') GROUP BY sfhdr1 ,sfhdr2 ,sfhdr3 ,sfhdr4 ,sfhdr5

SELECT REPLACE(sfhdr1 ,':' ,'') sfhdr1 ,REPLACE(sfhdr2 ,':' ,'') sfhdr2 ,REPLACE(sfhdr3 ,':' ,'') sfhdr3 ,REPLACE(sfhdr4 ,':' ,'') sfhdr4 ,REPLACE(sfhdr5 ,':' ,'') sfhdr5 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id2 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') GROUP BY sfhdr1 ,sfhdr2 ,sfhdr3 ,sfhdr4 ,sfhdr5

SELECT REPLACE(sfhdr1 ,':' ,'') infoone_sfhdr1 ,REPLACE(sfhdr2 ,':' ,'') infoone_sfhdr2 ,REPLACE(sfhdr3 ,':' ,'') infoone_sfhdr3 ,REPLACE(sfhdr4 ,':' ,'') infoone_sfhdr4 ,REPLACE(sfhdr5 ,':' ,'') infoone_sfhdr5 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id77 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') GROUP BY sfhdr1 ,sfhdr2 ,sfhdr3 ,sfhdr4 ,sfhdr5

SELECT customer_trx_id trx_id1 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id1 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT customer_trx_id infosumz_trx_id1 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT inv_number order_num ,inv_type type ,inv_source_id inv_source_id ,inv_source_name inv_source ,TO_CHAR(order_date ,'DD-MON-YY') order_date ,sfdata1 ,sfdata2 ,sfdata3 ,sfdata4 ,sfdata5 ,(subtotal_amount - delivery_charges) subtotal ,delivery_charges delivery ,promo_and_disc discounts ,tax_amount ,(subtotal_amount +promo_and_disc +tax_amount) order_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id1 AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id1 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT inv_number infosumz_order_num ,inv_type infosumz_type ,inv_source_id infosumz_inv_source_id ,inv_source_name infosumz_inv_source ,TO_CHAR(order_date ,'DD-MON-YY') infosumz_order_date ,sfdata1 infosumz_sfdata1 ,sfdata2 infosumz_sfdata2 ,sfdata3 infosumz_sfdata3 ,sfdata4 infosumz_sfdata4 ,sfdata5 infosumz_sfdata5 ,(subtotal_amount - delivery_charges) infosumz_subtotal ,delivery_charges infosumz_delivery ,promo_and_disc infosumz_discounts ,tax_amount infosumz_tax ,(subtotal_amount +promo_and_disc +tax_amount) infosumz_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infosumz_trx_id1 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') pg_break ,sumz.subtotal_amount summarize_subtotal ,sumz.delivery_charges summarize_delivery ,sumz.promo_and_disc summarize_discounts ,sumz.tax_amount summarize_tax ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id1 AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id1 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='SOFTHDR_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') pg_break ,sumz.subtotal_amount summarize_subtotal ,sumz.delivery_charges summarize_delivery ,sumz.promo_and_disc summarize_discounts ,sumz.tax_amount summarize_tax ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id1 AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id1 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='BILLTO_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq insert_seq ,'GRAND TOTAL:' summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') pg_break ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_subtotal ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_delivery ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_discounts ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_tax ,sumz.subtotal_amount summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id1 AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id1 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='GRAND_TOTAL' ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sumz.insert_seq infosumz_insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name infosumz_summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) infosumz_total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') infosumz_pg_break ,sumz.subtotal_amount infosumz_summarize_subtotal ,sumz.delivery_charges infosumz_summarize_delivery ,sumz.promo_and_disc infosumz_summarize_discounts ,sumz.tax_amount infosumz_summarize_tax ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) infosumz_summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infosumz_trx_id1 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='SOFTHDR_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') ,sumz.subtotal_amount ,sumz.delivery_charges ,sumz.promo_and_disc ,sumz.tax_amount ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infosumz_trx_id1 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='BILLTO_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'GRAND TOTAL:' ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,sumz.subtotal_amount FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infosumz_trx_id1 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='GRAND_TOTAL' ) ORDER BY infosumz_insert_seq

SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') pg_break ,sumz.subtotal_amount summarize_subtotal ,sumz.delivery_charges summarize_delivery ,sumz.promo_and_disc summarize_discounts ,sumz.tax_amount summarize_tax ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id2 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='SOFTHDR_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') pg_break ,sumz.subtotal_amount summarize_subtotal ,sumz.delivery_charges summarize_delivery ,sumz.promo_and_disc summarize_discounts ,sumz.tax_amount summarize_tax ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id2 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='BILLTO_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq insert_seq ,'GRAND TOTAL:' summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') pg_break ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_subtotal ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_delivery ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_discounts ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) summarize_tax ,sumz.subtotal_amount summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id2 AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='GRAND_TOTAL' ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sumz.insert_seq infoone_insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name infoone_summarize_text ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) infoone_total_orders ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') infoone_pg_break ,sumz.subtotal_amount infoone_summarize_subtotal ,sumz.delivery_charges infoone_summarize_delivery ,sumz.promo_and_disc infoone_summarize_discounts ,sumz.tax_amount infoone_summarize_tax ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) infoone_summarize_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id77 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='SOFTHDR_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'TOTAL FOR '||sumz.inv_source_name ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') ,sumz.subtotal_amount ,sumz.delivery_charges ,sumz.promo_and_disc ,sumz.tax_amount ,( sumz.subtotal_amount + sumz.delivery_charges + sumz.promo_and_disc + sumz.tax_amount ) FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id77 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='BILLTO_TOTALS' UNION ALL SELECT sumz.insert_seq ,'GRAND TOTAL:' ,DECODE( sumz.order_header_id ,1 ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDER' ,TO_CHAR(sumz.order_header_id)||' ORDERS' ) ,NVL(sumz.tax_code ,'N') ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,TO_NUMBER(NULL) ,sumz.subtotal_amount FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx sumz WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id77 AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type ='GRAND_TOTAL' ) ORDER BY infoone_insert_seq

SELECT customer_trx_id trx_id ,inv_number invoice_num ,inv_type type ,inv_source_id inv_source_id ,inv_source_name inv_source ,TO_CHAR(order_date ,'DD-MON-YY') order_date ,TO_CHAR(ship_date ,'DD-MON-YY') ship_date ,sfhdr1 ,sfhdr2 ,sfhdr3 ,sfhdr4 ,sfhdr5 ,sfdata1 ,sfdata2 ,sfdata3 ,sfdata4 ,sfdata5 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') ORDER BY insert_seq

SELECT item_code ,customer_product_code cust_prod_code ,item_description ,manuf_code ,qty ,uom ,unit_price ,extended_price FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id AND (item_code IS NULL OR item_code NOT IN ('SPC_CARD_INFO' ,'TD')) ORDER BY line_seq

SELECT item_code infodtl_item_code ,customer_product_code infodtl_cust_prod_code ,item_description infodtl_item_description ,manuf_code infodtl_manuf_code ,qty infodtl_qty ,uom infodtl_uom ,unit_price infodtl_unit_price ,extended_price infodtl_extended_price FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infodtl_trx_id AND (item_code IS NULL OR item_code NOT IN ('SPC_CARD_INFO' ,'TD')) ORDER BY line_seq

SELECT inv_number order_number_dup ,subtotal_amount subtotal ,promo_and_disc ,tax_amount sales_tax ,(subtotal_amount + promo_and_disc + tax_amount) total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id AND attribute1 ='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL')

SELECT inv_number infodtl_order_number_dup ,subtotal_amount infodtl_subtotal ,promo_and_disc infodtl_promo_and_disc ,tax_amount infodtl_sales_tax ,(subtotal_amount + promo_and_disc + tax_amount) infodtl_total FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infodtl_trx_id AND attribute1 !='PAYDOC' AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL')

SELECT line_type ,line_seq ,sf_text ,sf_amount ,NVL(page_break ,'N') page_break FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_totals WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id ORDER BY line_seq

SELECT line_type infodtl_line_type ,line_seq infodtl_line_seq ,sf_text infodtl_sf_text ,sf_amount infodtl_sf_amount ,NVL(page_break ,'N') infodtl_page_break FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_totals WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infodtl_trx_id ORDER BY line_seq
SELECT item_description spc_card_details FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines a WHERE a.request_id =:p_request_id AND a.cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id AND a.customer_trx_id =:trx_id AND a.item_code ='SPC_CARD_INFO'

SELECT item_description infodoc_spc_card_details FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines a WHERE a.request_id =:p_request_id AND a.cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND a.customer_trx_id =:infodtl_trx_id AND a.item_code ='SPC_CARD_INFO'

SELECT item_description infosumz_spc_card_details FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines a WHERE a.request_id =:p_request_id AND a.cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND a.customer_trx_id =:infosumz_trx_id1 AND a.item_code ='SPC_CARD_INFO'
SELECT extended_price tiered_discount FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:cons_inv_id AND customer_trx_id =:trx_id AND item_code ='TD'
SELECT extended_price infodoc_tiered_discount FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infodtl_trx_id AND item_code ='TD'
SELECT extended_price infosumz_tiered_discount FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx_lines WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND customer_trx_id =:infosumz_trx_id1 AND item_code ='TD'

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT customer_number) ,0) ,'fm0999999') TOTAL_CUSTOMERS ,TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(cbi_number) ,0) ,'fm09999999') TOTAL_INVOICES ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(cbi_amount) ,0) ,'fm099999990.90') TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM XX_AR_CBI_TOTALS_V WHERE request_id =:p_request_id

SELECT document_id doc_id99 ,document_id doc_id88 ,document_id doc_id77 ,UPPER(layout) layout99 ,sort_by sort_by99 ,attribute2 total_by99 ,attribute3 page_break99 ,cons_inv_id info_cbi_id99 ,cons_inv_id info_cbi_id88 ,cons_inv_id info_cbi_id77 FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history WHERE 1 =1 AND print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND paydoc !='Y' AND process_flag !='Y' AND customer_id =:info_customer_id AND attribute7 =:info_billing_site_id AND attribute13 =:p_request_id ORDER BY cons_inv_id

SELECT od_infocopies.cons_inv_id cons_inv_id99 ,od_infocopies.billing_number billing_number99 ,od_infocopies.currency currency99 ,od_infocopies.terms terms99 ,TO_CHAR( NVL( xx_ar_print_summbill.get_bill_from_date(od_infocopies.cust_id ,od_infocopies.site_id ,od_infocopies.cons_inv_id ,od_infocopies.infocopy_tag ) ,TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) ,'DD-MON-YY' ) bill_from_date99 -- ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date99 ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE)-1 ,'DD-MON-YY') bill_to_date99 ,TO_DATE(NULL) payment_due99 ,xx_ar_cbi_infocopy_ministmnt ( od_infocopies.cons_inv_id ,od_infocopies.req_id ,'EXTAMT_PLUS_DELVY' ) cbi_extamt_incl_delvy99 ,xx_ar_cbi_infocopy_ministmnt ( od_infocopies.cons_inv_id ,od_infocopies.req_id ,'DISCOUNT' ) cbi_promo_and_disc99 ,xx_ar_cbi_infocopy_ministmnt ( od_infocopies.cons_inv_id ,od_infocopies.req_id ,'TAX' ) cbi_tax99 ,od_infocopies.cbi_amount_due cbi_amount_due99 ,TO_CHAR(NULL) scanline99 ,od_infocopies.pd_layout pd_layout99 ,'INFORMATIONAL COPY' doc_title99 FROM ( SELECT customer_id cust_id ,to_number(attribute7) site_id ,cons_inv_id ,attribute6 billing_number ,attribute15 currency ,attribute4 terms ,attribute8 infocopy_tag ,attribute13 req_id ,attribute14 cbi_amount_due ,layout pd_layout ,document_id doc_id FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history a WHERE a.customer_id =:info_customer_id AND a.document_id =:doc_id99 AND a.attribute8 ='INV_IC' AND a.attribute13 =:p_request_id AND a.print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND a.paydoc !='Y' AND NVL(a.process_flag, 'N') !='Y' AND a.layout ='DETAIL' GROUP BY customer_id ,to_number(attribute7) ,cons_inv_id ,attribute6 ,attribute15 ,attribute4 ,attribute8 ,attribute13 ,attribute14 ,layout ,document_id ) od_infocopies WHERE 1 =1 AND od_infocopies.cust_id =:info_customer_id AND od_infocopies.site_id =:info_billing_site_id AND od_infocopies.doc_id =:doc_id99 AND od_infocopies.cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 UNION ALL SELECT arci.cons_inv_id ,arci.cons_billing_number ,arci.currency_code ,SUBSTR(terms.description ,1 ,15) ,TO_CHAR( NVL( xx_ar_print_summbill.get_bill_from_date(arci.customer_id ,arci.site_use_id ,arci.cons_inv_id ,'PAYDOC' ) ,TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) ,'DD-MON-YY' ) -- ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date) ,'DD-MON-YY') ,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(arci.cut_off_date)-1 ,'DD-MON-YY') ,TO_DATE(NULL) ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'EXTAMT_PLUS_DELVY') ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'DISCOUNT') ,xx_ar_cbi_paydoc_ministmnt (arci.cons_inv_id ,'TAX') ,od_summbills.attribute14 ,TO_CHAR(NULL) ,layout ,'INFORMATIONAL COPY' FROM xx_ar_cons_bills_history od_summbills ,ar_cons_inv arci ,ra_terms terms WHERE 1 =1 AND arci.cons_inv_id =SUBSTR(od_summbills.cons_inv_id ,1 ,LENGTH(od_summbills.cons_inv_id)-1) AND od_summbills.customer_id =:info_customer_id AND od_summbills.attribute13 =:p_request_id AND od_summbills.cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND od_summbills.attribute7 =:info_billing_site_id AND od_summbills.document_id =:doc_id99 AND od_summbills.attribute8 ='PAYDOC_IC' AND terms.term_id =arci.term_id AND od_summbills.print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND od_summbills.paydoc !='Y' AND NVL(od_summbills.process_flag, 'N') !='Y' AND od_summbills.layout ='DETAIL'

customer_id ,to_number(attribute7) ,cons_inv_id ,attribute6 ,attribute15 ,attribute4 ,attribute8 ,attribute13 ,attribute14 ,layout ,document_id ) od_infocopies WHERE 1 =1 AND od_infocopies.cust_id =:sumz_customer_id AND od_infocopies.site_id =:sumz_billing_site_id AND od_infocopies.doc_id =:doc_id88 AND od_infocopies.cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id88 UNION ALL SELECT arci.cons_inv_id ,to_number(attribute7) ,cons_inv_id ,attribute6 ,attribute15 ,attribute4 ,attribute8 ,attribute13 ,attribute14 ,layout ,document_id ) od_infocopies WHERE 1 =1 AND od_infocopies.cust_id =:one_customer_id AND od_infocopies.site_id =:one_billing_site_id AND od_infocopies.doc_id =:doc_id77 AND od_infocopies.cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id77 UNION ALL SELECT arci.cons_inv_id od_summbills.document_id =:doc_id77 AND od_summbills.attribute8 ='PAYDOC_IC' AND terms.term_id =arci.term_id AND od_summbills.print_date <=TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND od_summbills.paydoc !='Y' AND NVL(od_summbills.process_flag, 'N') !='Y' AND od_summbills.layout ='ONE'

SELECT customer_trx_id infodtl_trx_id ,inv_number infodtl_invoice_num ,inv_type infodtl_type ,inv_source_id infodtl_inv_source_id ,inv_source_name infodtl_inv_source ,TO_CHAR(order_date ,'DD-MON-YY') infodtl_order_date ,TO_CHAR(ship_date ,'DD-MON-YY') infodtl_ship_date ,sfhdr1 infodtl_sfhdr1 ,sfhdr2 infodtl_sfhdr2 ,sfhdr3 infodtl_sfhdr3 ,sfhdr4 infodtl_sfhdr4 ,sfhdr5 infodtl_sfhdr5 ,sfdata1 infodtl_sfdata1 ,sfdata2 infodtl_sfdata2 ,sfdata3 infodtl_sfdata3 ,sfdata4 infodtl_sfdata4 ,sfdata5 infodtl_sfdata5 FROM xx_ar_cbi_trx WHERE request_id =:p_request_id AND cons_inv_id =:info_cbi_id99 AND attribute1 IN ('PAYDOC_IC' ,'INV_IC') AND inv_type NOT IN ('SOFTHDR_TOTALS' ,'BILLTO_TOTALS' ,'GRAND_TOTAL') ORDER BY insert_seq
